data.title: denominational Christian church with a contemporary flavour and a grace
data.text:
CLC is dedicated to creating a meaningful impact right here in our local community, as well as on a national and global scale. Nestled in the vibrant heart of Portsmouth, our church brings together individuals of diverse ages, nationalities, and backgrounds from across the city and its surroundings.

At our core, we're a close-knit community that embraces the journey of growth. Our lives might be a bit messy and imperfect, but we're all on a shared path of seeking something greater. That something comes in the form of a life-altering connection with Jesus and with one another. Together, we're not just a congregation, but a group of companions, navigating this transformative journey side by side.

IN PERSON SERVICE

Welcome to our church! We are thrilled to invite you to come and join us in person. If you're looking for a new church family, you've come to the right place. Our doors are wide open to everyone, and you don't need to book in advance.

When you arrive, you'll be greeted by friendly faces and a warm atmosphere. FREE tea, coffee, and toast is available from 9:30am, so you can start your Sunday morning off right.

Our service begins at 10:30am, and it's filled with great worship and teachings that are sure to uplift and inspire you. We're passionate about connecting with God and with one another, so you can expect a welcoming and inclusive atmosphere.

After the service, you're invited to stick around for tea and coffee, and a chance to chat with our community. There is also an opportunity to receive prayer. So come and join us this Sunday, and experience the love and joy of our church family. We can't wait to meet you!

Our morning service are available online through the “CLC TV GLOBAL” YouTube channel. You can watch live or on catch up from the comfort of your own home or wherever you may be.

Our online church community is open and welcoming to people from all backgrounds and walks of life. We believe that everyone is a valuable member of our community, and we strive to create a safe and inclusive space for all. Do feel free to chat with our friendly hosts using the chat facility.
